body.projectsubtitle: My background, experience, and skills. I have worked at the following places:

history.title: Hobby programming
history.description: I started programming back in 2019 as a hobby.

history.title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Engineering (Mechanical Engineering)
history.description: While studying I also started developing Kaxe .

history.title: Tutor at AAU
history.description: I have been a tutor for first-year students at Aalborg University (AAU). Here i held activities and helped new students get started with their studies. In september 2023 i was a volunteer tutor, and in september 2024 i was responsible for a part of the program and 2025 I was responsible for the whole program for the institute of Materials and Production.

features.text: Helping over 150 new students both as a volunteer and leading the program
Led and coordinated a team of 40 tutors

history.title: Private tutor/mentor at GoTutor and Toptutor
history.description: I have been a private tutor/mentor at GoTutor and Toptutor, teaching subjects such as mathematics, physics, and programming to high school students with over 500 hours of tutoring experience.

history.title: Teaching at Den frie digitale skole
history.description: I teach programming and mathematics to students in 5th to 10th grade.

history.title: Software Developer at Den frie digitale skole
history.description: I worked on developing the school's internal systems, including a scheduling system for teachers and students. See the case here.

history.title: Studying my Master in Mechanical Engineering (electro-mechanical system design)
history.description: Currently studying my Master in Mechanical Engineering with a specialization in electro-mechanical system design at Aalborg University (AAU).

cards.title: Diploma for tutor at AAU 2025
keyfeatures: Responsible for the whole program and leading a team of tutors

cards.title: Diploma for tutor at AAU 2024
keyfeatures: Responsible for a part of the program and leading a team of tutors

cards.title: Diploma for tutor at AAU 2023
keyfeatures: Helping new students both as a volunteer tutor
